tool_description: Corrently - from italian corrente, which is energy
name: Corrently
title: Corrently

api_list.name: omReadings
api_list.description: Provides a list of available meterrs in the OpenMETER project ( https://www.openmeter.de/ ) which grants access for analytics as data discovery.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://corrently.p.rapidapi.com/alternative/openmeter/readings"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "corrently.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://corrently.p.rapidapi.com/alternative/openmeter/readings"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "corrently.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

meterId.description: identifier to be used in other methods like readings or activities.

location.description: Basic address information for geo coding

measurementType.description: Physical quantity being measured by the meter

loadProfileType.description: Metering load profile type associated with the meter

scalingFactor.description: Factor imposed on metered current AND voltage by a transducer

currentScalingFactor.description: Factor imposed on metered current by a transducer

voltageScalingFactor.description: Factor imposed on metered voltage by a transducer

api_list.name: gsiDispatch
api_list.description:
Dispatch of green energy has two aspects to consider:
  - Availability of gerneration facility (depends on weather and installed capacity)
  - Demand of energy
Using the green power index (GrünstromIndex) we have received a tool to automate distribution of energy in order to prevent redispatch situations. Doing this alows to opimize resource usage (tactical) and leverage data for investment planning (strategic).

optional_parameters.name: zip
optional_parameters.description: Zipcode (Postleitzahl) of a city in Germany.

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: Any valid Stromkonto account (address).

premix.description: Green Energy Mix prior to dispatch of given city

postmix.description: Green Energy Mix after dispatch of given city

dispatch_from.description: List of current sources of green energy (into requested location)

location.description: GeoJSON encoded location of target or source of green energy.

dispatch_target.description: List of current targets of green energy (out of requested location)

location.description: GeoJSON encoded location of target or source of green energy.

start.description: Starting time of window evaluated in order to get dispatches

end.description: Ending time of window evaluated for this request/dispatches.

avg_distance_km.description: Averaged geospatial distance in kilometers between energy generation and usage at requested location.

api_list.name: ocppSessions
api_list.description:
Returns lastSession info of OCCP Cloud service for clearing in corrently ecosystem. Might be tested via [OCPP cloud simulator](https://ocpp.corrently.cloud).
Last session Info of managed EV charging stations connected to the correnty ecosystem.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://corrently.p.rapidapi.com/alternative/ocpp/lastSessions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "corrently.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://corrently.p.rapidapi.com/alternative/ocpp/lastSessions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "corrently.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

lastSession.description: lastSession Info as given by easee API

api_list.name: meteringGet
api_list.description: Retrieves a metered reading using account (Stromkonto).

optional_parameters.name: account
optional_parameters.description: Account/Address (Stromkonto) to retrieve reading for.

account.description: Stromkonto/Metering address allocated (this is not the MELOID!)

1.8.0.description: Reading as provided as input in Wh

1.8.1.description: Green energy calculated using Green Power Index (GrünstromIndex) in Wh

1.8.2.description: Grey energy calculated using Green Power Index (GrünstromIndex) in Wh

timeStamp.description: API Consensus time this reading was fully received

_processingTime.description: Time this reading got imported into consensus (e.q. signed timestamp).

co2_g_standard.description: CO2 Emission of metered energy in a standard mix

co2_g_oekostrom.description: CO2 Emission of metered energy in a green energy mix (e.q. Ökostromtarif)

ttl.description: Time to Live for this reader. If no update is provided it gets decommissioned.

credits.description: Update credits this meter has. Gets refilled automtically to prevent too frequent updates

api_list.name: tariffSLPH0
api_list.description: Provides pricing data for private households with standard load profiles (Standardlastprofil H0).

optional_parameters.name: zipcode
optional_parameters.description: Zipcode (Postzleitzahl) of a city in Germany.

ap.description: Energy price in cent per kwh. (Arbeitspreis) including all taxes and fees.

gp.description: Base price in euro per montah (Grundpreis) including all taxes and fees.

api_list.name: co2compensate
api_list.description: You might call the /price API endpoint prior to a checkout to get latest pricing information. This method returns a URL for direct checkout using Stripe. All CO2 offset prices are based on VCS Verified CO2 Emission Reduction In accordance with the requirements of ISO 14064-1. CO2 prices are actual market prices and may change every hour.

optional_parameters.name: co2
optional_parameters.description: CO2 equivalence in gram to compensate

optional_parameters.name: liter
optional_parameters.description: Liter of fuel to compensate.

optional_parameters.name: kwh
optional_parameters.description: Kilo Watt hours of electricity to co2 offset.

items.description: URL for interactive checkout and payment of CO2 offset for a co2 certificate.

api_list.name: stromkontoBalances
api_list.description: Stromkonto represents a core component of the Corrently Ecosystem. It is a ledger for green energy related transactions and gets heavily used by the public Web-UI on www.stromkonto.net . Beside of some decoration and reformating operations all data is backed by the [Energychain blockchain](https://github.com/energychain/) to provide consensus of balances and transactions. Use this API Endppoint if you prefere not to work with low level Distributed Ledger Technology (Blockchain).

optional_parameters.name: account
optional_parameters.description: Ethereum style address referencing a valid account (AKA Stromkonto).

balance.description: Sum owned - sum due by account

txid.description: Unique hash of this transaction as provided by counter signing party

cashier.description: Pretty print of counter signing party

txtype.description: Type of transaction per cashier implementation and schema

api_list.name: gsiBesthour
api_list.description: Simple Wrapper around the GreenPowerIndex for easy integration into almost any SmartHome system that allows access to a JSON/REST Service This endpoint is designed to indicate if a device should be turned on or off. (Switch state).

optional_parameters.name: zip
optional_parameters.description: Zipcode (Postleitzahl) of a city in Germany.

optional_parameters.name: hours
optional_parameters.description: How many hours in row do you need the device turned on?

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: Any valid Stromkonto account (address).

optional_parameters.name: timeframe
optional_parameters.description: Number of hours to check (default 24 hours from now).

schema.description: true if device should be turned on now. false if not.

api_list.name: gsiMarketdata
api_list.description: Compatible to awattar (https://api.awattar.de/v1/marketdata) API interface but data comes from GreenPowerIndex instead of EPEXSpot.

optional_parameters.name: zip
optional_parameters.description: Zipcode (Postleitzahl) of a city in Germany.

marketprice.description: Actual Marketprice for regional green power in EUR per MWh

api_list.name: quittungZugferd
api_list.description: Allows to retrieve XML of the zugferd invoice.

optional_parameters.name: account
optional_parameters.description: Quittung Identifier  (serialnumber generated during receipt generation process)

api_list.name: omActivities
api_list.description: Provides a list of available meterrs in the OpenMETER project ( https://www.openmeter.de/ ) which grants access for analytics as data discovery.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://corrently.p.rapidapi.com/alternative/openmeter/activities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "corrently.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: easeeSessions
api_list.description: Refer to easee.cloud API for details.

optional_parameters.name: password
optional_parameters.description: Password as used on easy.cloud

optional_parameters.name: username
optional_parameters.description: Username as used on easy.cloud

lastSession.description: lastSession Info as given by easee API

api_list.name: wimstatus
api_list.description: Access to status information of an existing metering change and allocation process.

optional_parameters.name: vid
optional_parameters.description: VID key of the process.

api_list.name: co2sources
api_list.description: Valid and certified sources of co2 compensation.

api_list.name: stromkontoChoices

optional_parameters.name: account
optional_parameters.description: Ethereum style address referencing a valid account alias (never use Stromkonto directly!).

balance.description: Sum owned - sum due by account

txid.description: Unique hash of this transaction as provided by counter signing party

cashier.description: Pretty print of counter signing party

txtype.description: Type of transaction per cashier implementation and schema

api_list.name: co2price
api_list.description: All CO2 offset prices are based on VCS Verified CO2 Emission Reduction In accordance with the requirements of ISO 14064-1. CO2 prices are actual market prices and may change every hour.

optional_parameters.name: liter
optional_parameters.description: Liter of fuel to compensate.

optional_parameters.name: co2
optional_parameters.description: CO2 equivalence in gram to compensate

optional_parameters.name: kwh
optional_parameters.description: Kilo Watt hours of electricity to co2 offset.

priceCent.description: EUR Cent price of co2 offset certificate

priceEUR.description: EUR price of co2 offset certificate

getCO2.description: CO2 offset you receive. Might be more than requested, due to minimum requirements on the market.

api_list.name: tariffcomponents
api_list.description:
Provides insides into the different cost components of energy for a private household.
Sample Request: https://api.corrently.io/v2.0/tariff/components?email=demo%40corrently.io&zip=69168&kwha=3300

optional_parameters.name: kwha
optional_parameters.description: Total amount of energy in kilo-watt-hours per year. (sample 2100)

optional_parameters.name: wh
optional_parameters.description: If provided together with milliseconds, a cost component stament for a particular event (like charging a car) will be created.

optional_parameters.name: milliseconds
optional_parameters.description: If provided all results will be scaled to this timeframe

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: Valid email address to assign request to (pre offer generation). Ensure GDPR (DSGVO) at any time

optional_parameters.name: zipcode
optional_parameters.description: Zipcode (Postzleitzahl) of a city in Germany.

sum.description: Total sum in Euro for this price component.

describtion.description: What is this price component about

per.description: Single unit price multiyplier is based on

api_list.name: gsiPrediction
api_list.description: Retrieval the GreenPowerIndex (GrünstromIndex) for a given city (by zipcode) in Germany.

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: Any valid Stromkonto account (address).

optional_parameters.name: zip
optional_parameters.description: Zipcode (Postleitzahl) of a city in Germany.

scaled.description: Indicates if scaling is in operation to predict values

energyprice.description: Local/regional energyprice modification (cent per kWh or euro per MWh).

co2_g_oekostrom.description: CO2 footprint in Gramm per kwh (only Green Power)

location.description: Standarized location info sourced for prediction

h0.description: Indicates number of hours a device should run

api_list.name: omMeters
api_list.description: Provides a list of available meterrs in the OpenMETER project ( https://www.openmeter.de/ ) which grants access for analytics as data discovery.
api_list.code:
import requests

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "corrently.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
